mapper.insert: INSERT INTO A_BOARD(A_BNO, A_TITLE, A_CONTENT, A_TYPE, ID) VALUES(A_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{a_title}, #{a_content}, #{a_type}, #{id})
mapper.select:
SELECT A_BNO, A_TITLE, A_REGDATE, A_CNT, A_TYPE, ID FROM(SELECT A_BNO, A_TITLE, A_REGDATE, A_CNT, A_TYPE, ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A_BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM A_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY A_BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(A_BNO) FROM A_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND a_BNO > 0
